info.name: OMNISEARCH-MCP
info.description: Complete testing collection for OMNISEARCH MCP Server with all 19 tools

request.description: Test Tavily general search for Tesla information
Test Tavily news search for Tesla latest news
Test Tavily academic search for EV research papers
Test Brave search for privacy-focused results
Test Kagi premium search for high-quality results
Test Perplexity AI for complex reasoning and analysis
Test Kagi FastGPT for instant AI answers
Test Jina Reader for single webpage content extraction
Test Jina Batch Reader for multiple webpage comparison
Test Jina PDF Reader for PDF document analysis
Test Firecrawl Scrape for clean content extraction
Test Firecrawl Extract for AI-powered data extraction
Test Firecrawl Research for comprehensive multi-source analysis
Test Jina fact grounding for statement verification
Test multi-tool workflow for comprehensive research
Test AI's ability to select the correct tools for different tasks
